name: Amanda Blount
text: My family loves going to our pizza hut. The waitress we normally have is awesome. She is just fantastic. And we have never have anything bad to say about the food. Yum yum

name: John Shirley
text: The staff are really nice. The pizza is delicious with loads of options.  It's super easy to order online and pick up.

name: Erika Masters
text: The poor waitress was left with no help as there was 5 people cooking??? Poor management. Waitress was super awesome and patient!

name: Amy Miles
text: Server was helpful coordinating order between two tables.

name: Seth Snyder
text: Really, really great customer service. They treated me like gold. Gonna be my new college pizza spot in town.

name: Kristiana Colegado Dobell
text: Great service, there is never not a smile! I recently learned that this is the 3rd oldest pizza hut ever so now it feels historical every time I walk in. Food was okay, but that's just my expectation when it comes to almost every pizza hut since it's essentially fast food.

name: Colt Arneman
text: Decent food. cute girl working ü§£

name: LJ Averitt
text: Good for a pizza hut

name: Jillie Bean D
text: Ordered a pizza online on my way home. They offer many delicious options, I love how custom they can be. Pizza was hot and toppings were fresh,  awesome pizza!

name: Kathy Ishman
text: Helpful staff. Called ahead and ate in. Food was good

name: Del Rounds
text: Sad, sad Pizza Hut. It was extremely hot and when we asked about some A.C. they said it was broke and blamed it on corporate delay for approval. When i considered the salad bar, but everything looked wilted and most of the sauces were ‚Ä¶More

name: Dustan D
text: On time and good pizza when ordered. Have ordered dozens of times from this location with no issues.

name: Michael Sheehan
text: Great service and the buffet was pretty good.  Overall, great place for inexpensive lunch.

name: Chris Todd
text: It has a fast, affordable pizza buffet. They will also make piping hot vegetarian pizzas if you ask.

name: Sandy bowman

text: Good food and the workers are really nice

text: Good staff but it's Pizza hut what do you want

text: The food was really good and the waitress that we had she was exalt.

name: Josh f
text: Blaming the customer when they have a problem.. very smart idea.. laughing at them while they are waiting for you to make the food.  Very upset.  hopefully corporate will resolve.

text: FOOD AND SERVER WERE DELICIOUS!!!

name: Amber Brill
text: Pizza was okay but service was great
